item.title: The Bank for the Unbankable
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The Business Development Bank of Canada is neither a traditional bank nor a typical venture capitalist. Built to serve entrepreneurs rejected by commercial lenders, BDC has quietly become one of the most powerful counter-cyclical institutions in the Canadian economy—and the country’s largest venture capital investor. This is the story of how a government-owned bank learned to profit from market failure while stabilizing innovation, startups, and small businesses through crises.

item.title: The 2025 Strategy Playlist: 10 Masterclasses in Business & Innovation
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: From the history of the Vikings to the future of the Metaverse, here are the 10 standout podcast episodes that defined the listening year.
